alert.note: Alert for Washington (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 7:45PM CDT until June 30 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Washington County in south central Illinois... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 745 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Nashville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Nashville, Centralia, Okawville, Wamac, Lively Grove, Irvington, Ashley, Posen, Beaucoup, Hoyleton, Johannisburg, Covington, Richview, Addieville, Oakdale, Radom, New Minden, Du Bois, Venedy, and Huegely. This includes Interstate 64 in Illinois between exits 41 and 61. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
